developer.title: Full-Stack Web developer and Scrum Master

title: üéØ Latest projects
description: I'm here to help your application a success.

recommandations.name: Dupoirier Christophe
recommandations.context: Product Leader at Renault & Professional Jury Member
recommandations.content: I had the opportunity to evaluate Fabien during his thesis defense in July 2024 as a professional jury member, and I can confirm that his level of technical knowledge and the quality of his intellectual approach to project design make him a serious candidate for a Full Stack Developer position.

recommandations.name: Dupoirier Christophe
recommandations.context: Product Leader at Renault & Professional Jury Member
recommandations.content: Fabien's career change has been perfectly successful as he previously worked as a Nursing Assistant in a medical environment. This demonstrates his unwavering commitment and true professional attitude.

recommandations.name: Nicolas Zanforlini
recommandations.context: Lead Developer Freelance & Professional Jury Member
recommandations.content: I had the opportunity to evaluate his skills during his diploma examination. He is a motivated, competent, and curious young man, and he is an asset to any team with good communication skills. I highly recommend him.

recommandations.name: Beno√Æt Schiex
recommandations.content: Having followed Fabien during his training, I noted his qualities of rigor and commitment, which allowed him to achieve an excellent level in web application design and development by the end of his course.

recommandations.name: Beno√Æt Schiex
recommandations.context: Trainer and Developer at O'Clock School
recommandations.content: The projects carried out demonstrated an understanding of the needs, with technical responses that were always of high quality both in terms of choices and implementation. His curiosity and rigor were the foundation of his successful training.

recommandations.name: Adrien Delcroix
recommandations.content: I had the opportunity to follow Fabien during his web development training, and he stood out for his seriousness and motivation. Always positive and diligent, he successfully met every challenge, working autonomously while being comfortable in a team.

recommandations.name: Adrien Delcroix
recommandations.content: Fabien also demonstrated a great ability to overcome technical difficulties, always seeking effective solutions. His team spirit and involvement were essential during collaborative projects.

recommandations.name: Alexis Vignot
recommandations.content: I had the pleasure of working with Fabien Thiesset on the Casalink project, and I can only praise his skills and professionalism as a full-stack developer. Fabien demonstrated mastery of both front-end and back-end technologies, which was crucial to the success of our project.

recommandations.name: Alexis Vignot
recommandations.content: His methodical approach and ability to solve complex problems have helped overcome many technical challenges. Additionally, Fabien is an excellent communicator, always ready to share his knowledge and collaborate effectively with the team.

recommandations.name: Alexis Vignot
recommandations.content: I highly recommend Fabien for any future opportunities. His passion for development and commitment to excellence make him a valuable asset for any project.

recommandations.name: Emilie Suray
recommandations.context: Quality & Risk Management Officer at Helene Borel Center
recommandations.content: Fabien has shown a great ability to reinvent himself by transitioning from the role of coordinator to that of a developer. I had the opportunity to work with him, and his seriousness, rigor, and interpersonal skills make him a valuable collaborator.

recommandations.name: Emilie Suray
recommandations.context: Quality & Risk Management Officer at Helene Borel Center
recommandations.content: His career change demonstrates his motivation and ability to learn quickly. Fabien brings a human touch to his projects, which, combined with his new technical expertise, is an undeniable asset to any team.

recommandations.name: Sylvette Depreux
recommandations.context: Head of the IT Department at Helene Borel Center
recommandations.content: As the head of the IT department, I worked with Fabien, who was the IT referent for his healthcare facility. Fabien acted as the liaison between the needs expressed by the users in the facility and the IT department. He communicated requests for improvements, software updates, and necessary equipment. Fabien also generated statistics from the information system data.

recommandations.name: Sylvette Depreux
recommandations.context: Head of the IT Department at Helene Borel Center
recommandations.content: Fabien was a dedicated collaborator, capable of bridging the gap between the IT department and the facility where he worked. The collaboration was effective, improving the quality of service provided to users. Fabien is a calm collaborator, capable of taking a step back and suggesting solutions.

recommandations.name: Anthony Goguillon
recommandations.context: IT technician at Helene Borel Center
recommandations.content: I have had the pleasure of working with Fabien on various IT-related issues multiple times. Fabien is excellent at expressing the needs of other users and translating them in a simple and effective manner, which allows for quicker resolutions.

recommandations.name: Anthony Goguillon
recommandations.context: IT technician at Helene Borel Center
recommandations.content: What we also appreciate about Fabien is his enthusiasm for technology, a true passion that enables him to be a source of proposals. Not to mention his interpersonal skills, his rigor, his willingness to make things progress, and of course, his good humor.

title: Available for Mobile, Vehicle, and Remote in France
üü¢ And now?
description: I'm ready to help you with your project. Let's talk about it!
content: I search a job as a Front-end or Back-end Developer in a company that values human and technical skills. I am also open to an apprenticeship opportunities (application developer or AI expert).
